snippet: Though there was little for him to say, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg was asked about Lenox Hill Hospital's role in a celebrity arrival.
abstract: Though there was little for him to say, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg was asked about Lenox Hill Hospital's role in a celebrity arrival.
lead_paragraph: When Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg began taking general questions at a news conference on Tuesday, the first topic was not his coming State of the City address, or teacher evaluation problems that are endangering federal education money, or even the New Hampshire primary.

headline.main: First, Mr. Mayor, What of Beyoncé's Baby?
